title: "Chemists used machine learning and molecular modeling to identify potential anticancer drugs"
excerpt: "RUDN University chemists and colleagues from China built several machine learning models and discovered a group of potential drugs that inhibit the enzyme responsible for uncontrolled cell division. The results were published in Biomedicines."
